channel.title: Projects on Noah Glaser
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Noah Glaser

item.title: ElectroBlocks
item.description: An Arduino IDE that uses Blockly. It comes with a built-in simulator as well. It’s like video editing for code. It also allows you to upload code directly to the Arduino from the website.

item.title: Space Jumper
item.description: This is a space jumper game buitl in phaser 3. It uses animations, physics, and sprite groups. The assets for the game came from kenny.nl.

item.title: Svelte Arduino LED Matrix
item.description: This website allows you to control and LED matrix directly from the browser. It uses experimental serial api to do this. It was built using svelte framework.

item.title: Svelte Prism NPM Package
item.description: This npm package allows you integrate prismjs into a svelte website. Prismjs is a library for displaying code on webpages. I have example repositories showing how to use it with Sapper and Routify. You can find out more by clicking hte github link. I am always open for pull requests. :)
